definitions.definition: The act of attending ; the state of being present ; presence .
examples: Attendance at the meeting is required.
All those in attendance are to sign this slip.

definitions.definition: The persons or number of persons present.
examples: The class sat down so that the teacher could take attendance .

definitions.definition: The frequency with which one has been present for a regular activity or set of events.
examples: John's attendance for the conventions was not good.

definitions.definition: Attention paid to something; careful regard.

main_definition: The act of attending ; the state of being present ; presence .
secondary_definitions: The persons or number of persons present.
The frequency with which one has been present for a regular activity or set of events.
( obsolete ) Attention paid to something; careful regard.
